column1:
User:<image>Describe the image with details and give key words to describe the motifs.
Assistant: The image is a pencil drawing of a mosque. The mosque is depicted with a large dome and a tall minaret. The dome is round and has a pointed top. The minaret is tall and has a square base. The mosque is surrounded by trees and there is a cemetery in front of it. The drawing is done in a realistic style and the artist has used shading to create depth and texture.
